item.title: Heist
item.description: This is will my dive into writeups on boxes from Hack The Box. Heist is a windows box which has been rated easy and is part of the intro to dante Track. Lets jump right in! Recon After starting the box we get the ip as 10.10.10.149 and as always we start with nmap to scan for open ports and services running on them. We’ve got smb,a web server runing IIS and winrm running.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Bryan Theuri alias Or0ch1 a member of @fr334aks-mini ctf team. I a Cyber Security and Forensics Consultant at Cyber Security Africa. Currently explanding my skillset to Malware Analysis and Mobile Application Penetration Testing.

item.title: Knight CTF 2022
item.description: This was one of the CTFs that started off the year and it was an online jeopardy style Capture the Flag (CTF) competition hosted by the Knight Squad community from Bangladesh. The CTF started on 20 January 2022 09:00PM GMT +6 and ended on 21 January 2022 11:59PM GMT +6. I participated under team @Fr334aks-mini and we managed pos 120 out of 752 teams with 2750 points. I focused primarily on the forensic and steganography categories and managed to solve 4 challenges,2 from each category.
